name: Black Jack
description:
BlackJack the classic 21 card game.

Now you can play Black Jack when you want, where you want.

Black Jack rules are the same as the original Blackjack game and just like the real game, hit, stick, split, double-down and apply the insurance

Try your luck to beat the smart Ai (artificial intelligent) dealer and win and clear out the house by trying out your new strategies.
